line_1: Quo' she, 'Ye ken we've been sae busy

line_2: She's saft at best an' something lazy,

line_1: Quo' she, 'Ye ken we've been sae busy
line_2: ' That trouth, my head is grown right dizzie,

line_1: And doing nothing finds himself too busy.
line_2: Business he deems too hard, trifles too easy,
